attributes.action: Bring a sense of pride back to the UK
attributes.additional_details:
It's often noted that people believe that patriotism  within the UK is dead. but i believe that they are ways to help bring back some pride in our country!
i believe that if the BBC was to change it's into sequence audio for the evening news to "Land of hope and glory" then this can have major positive effect on society and it'll raise spirits within our country.
or if that won't happen we could have the national anthem play every day on the television so that everyone who has come back from there hard working days can sit back inform of the TV together and listen to the greatest anthem in the country!
